stepper-1.title: Attach document
stepper-1.desc: For security reasons and to ensure the relevance of the data on our platform, we ask you to send us a photo of your stamped business card or your license to practice.

stepper-2.title: Acts
stepper-2.sub-title: Please select your primary and secondary procedures in order of growth
stepper-2.typing: Commencez à taper pour rechercher des actes

check-status.title: Welcome to Med.tn
check-status.desc: We welcome you on Med, the N°1 medical platform in Africa. Our team will contact you to validate your account. For security reasons and to ensure the relevance of the data on our platform.
check-status.contact: For more information, please contact us by :
